did.unittitle: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local 125 (Utica, NY) Records, 1928-1974

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America (UBC)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: The United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America, often referred to as the United Brotherhood of Carpenters was formed in 1881. It has grown to be one of the largest trade unions in the United States, and between its chapters and locals there is international cooperation. Local 125 is based in Utica, New York.
